name: Dice-Shift
description:
Dice-Shift is a 2D top-down racing game published for the Mini Jam 83. The theme for this jam was to make dice the main mechanic of the game. In this game, you drive multiple 6-speed racing cars and you use a dice to change gear.

Controls

Arrows to steer/accelerate/brake

Space/LMB to change the gear

Delete/Backspace to restart the lap

Esc to go back to the main menu or exit the game

Goal

With the 6 different cars that are available to you, you can try to beat my own records on each of the 20 tracks included in the game.

Credits

The menu music is made by Evan King and the cars were made by Brad Gilbertson.
